eObjectAttributeElement.popMethodAttr: CALC:Accessor.Element("Auto EBR Report", "Report Type").StrValue == "EBR Template" ? "CO_BATCH_RECORD_TEMPLATE_SP;DOCUMENT_FORMAT;WHERE DOCUMENT_TYPE='EBRTEMPLATE'" : "CO_LIST_SP;LIST_ITEM_ID;WHERE LIST_ID='Product EBR'"
MM_MATERIAL_SP;MATERIAL_ID;WHERE MATERIAL_TYPE IN ('Product', 'Intermediate', 'WIP') ORDER BY MATERIAL_ID
CO_UOM_SP;UOM;WHERE UOM_TYPE IN (1,3,9) ORDER BY UOM
CO_LIST_SP;LIST_ITEM_ID;WHERE LIST_ID = 'Recipe Type' ORDER BY LIST_ITEM_ID

eProcCompDataLine.c1_value: Auto Complete with UI display: No
Phase is not set to Auto Complete
